text: Fujiyama (written: 藤山) is a Japanese surname. Notable people with the surname include: *, Japanese politician and business executive * Cosmo Fujiyama (born 1985), Japanese-American philanthropist *, Japanese singer and composer *, Japanese actress *, Japanese footballer * Shin Fujiyama, Japanese-American philanthropist *, Japanese footballer Category:Japanese-language surnames
title: Fujiyama (surname)
